message: Hello, Is there anybody using the uncertainties package (http://packages.python.org/uncertainties/) or an alternative in their calculations? It's just the right tool that I need for some of the sensitivity analysis in my model. I wonder about the package's performance. Would I get any big speed lost? Is there any way to add uncertainties for the whole array?
@gsever, the creator has provided numpy hooks in the uncertainties.unumpy module. Computations using this module will be much slower than normal computations using numpy.
